pages.title: Ra's Wrath
pages.text: While Ra's Wrath Is Applied, You Gain Resistance 3 And Strength 2. However, You Are Constantly On Fire Unless You Are In Water (For Obvious Reasons)

pages.title: Applying Ra's Wrath
pages.text: Using An Unconcealed Ra's Wrath Parchment Will Apply The Ra's Wrath Effect. Depending On The Parchment Used, You Will Receive It For A Longer Period Of Time Than A Normal Parchment Would Allow, Or You Can Receive It's Effects In A Stronger Variant.
